Header.title: HABIT 2025
Header.paragraph: An International Conference on Health and Agricultural Biotechnology: Innovations and Trends February 28- March 2, 2025

About.paragraph: The HABIT 2025 conference invites participants to explore "Health and Agricultural Biotechnology: Innovations and Trends" from February 28 to March 2, 2025, in Prayagraj, India. Organized by the Department of Biotechnology at MNNIT Allahabad, the conference aims to promote scientific knowledge and innovation, providing a platform for researchers to discuss recent advancements in food, health, and environmental biotechnology. Attendees can present their work in various categories, including young scientist awards, and gain insights from experts through keynote and plenary sessions. This multidisciplinary event encourages collaboration and the exchange of ideas in biotechnology.
Why2: Interdisciplinary approaches in health and food
Interdisciplinary approaches in agriculture and environment
